i1.name: Ionian_Fervor
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Irelia''' generates a [[stack]] of ''Ionian Fervor'' for each enemy champion hit by her [[Champion ability|abilities]], or if she hits at least one non-champion. ''Ionian Fervor'' lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and ability hits against enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monster|monsters}}, and stacking up to 4 times.

{{sbc|Ionian Fervor:}} For each stack, '''Irelia''' gains {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|7.5 to 20|1;7;13}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, up to a maximum of {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|7.5*4 to 20*4|1;7;13}}|attack speed}}.
At maximum stacks, '''Irelia's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{pp|10 to 61}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Unsteady:}} Enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} hit by ''{{ai|Flawless Duet|Irelia}}'' and ''{{ais|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}}'' initial barrage are {{as|marked|buzzword}} as ''Unsteady'' for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by ''{{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}''.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Irelia generates a stack of Ionian Fervor for each enemy champion hit by her Champion ability, or if she hits at least one non-champion. Ionian Fervor lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and ability hits against enemy champions and large monsters, and stacking up to 4 times.
Ionian Fervor: For each stack, Irelia gains 1;7;13 ‒ undefined bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 1;7;13 ‒ undefined.
At maximum stacks, Irelia's basic attacks deal 10 − 61 (based on level) (+ 20% bonus AD) bonus magic damage on-hit.
Innate - Unsteady: Enemy champions and large monsters hit by Irelia's Flawless Duet and Irelia's Vanguard's Edge initial barrage are marked as Unsteady for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by Irelia's Bladesurge.

q1.name: Bladesurge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|dashes}} 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals {{as|physical damage}}, applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects, and {{tip|heal|heals}} herself. ''Bladesurge'' deals {{pp|55 to 259}} '''bonus''' damage to {{tip|minions}}.

''Bladesurge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to {{fd|0.2}} seconds upon collision of targets {{as|marked|buzzword}} as {{cci|Bladesurge 2.png|Irelia/LoL#Ionian Fervor|Unsteady}}, and is reset if the target dies to or during ''Bladesurge's'' dash.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies on-hit effects, and heals herself. Bladesurge deals 55 − 259 (based on level) bonus damage to minions.
Bladesurge's cooldown is reduced to 0.2 seconds upon collision of targets marked as Unknown value: cci / Bladesurge 2.png / Irelia/LoL#Ionian Fervor / Unsteady, and is reset if the target dies to or during Bladesurge's dash.
q1.notes:
* ''Bladesurge'' will be buffered and cast when the cooldown ends or is reset if the player attempts to cast it within {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the cooldown ending/resetting.
* ''Bladesurge'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* If the target dies during ''Bladesurge's'' dash, '''Irelia''' may cast her other abilities during the dash. 
* If the target dies to ''Bladesurge'' and was also {{as|marked|buzzword}}, the cooldown is still fully refunded.
* ''Bladesurge'' will only allow '''Irelia''' to dash through walls if there is enough space for her on the other side.
* ''Bladesurge'' deals its damage and consumes {{as|marks|buzzword}} when '''Irelia''' collides with the target, or at the end of the dash if the target moves away.
** ''Bladesurge'' will not deal damage if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} beforehand.
*** The damage will be dealt if the target is in collision range when the dash is interrupted however.
*** {{si|Flash}} will interrupt the {{tip|dash}} but '''Irelia''' will still collide with and deal damage to her target if the blink leaves her in contact with it at the new location.
** '''Irelia''' will complete her remaining dash distance even if the damage is dealt earlier.
** If the target is {{tip|untargetable}}, ''Bladesurge'' will instead deals its damage at the end of the dash, rather than on collision.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% AD)
  • Heal: % AD

w1.name: Defiant_Dance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she increases ''Defiant Dance's'' damage over the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds of the channel and {{tip|Damage reduction|reduces}} incoming {{as|physical damage}} by {{pp|40 to 70|key=%}} {{as|(+ 7% per 100 AP)}} and incoming {{as|magic damage}} by {{pp|20 to 35|key=%}} {{as|(+ {{fd|3.5}}% per 100 AP)}}. ''Defiant Dance's'' charge cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.
''Defiant Dance'' can be recast within its duration, and does so automatically after the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, retaining ''Defiant Dance's'' damage reduction for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the recast is initiated and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies around her and within a line, increased by {{pp|key=%|type=channel time|0 to 200 for 11|0 to 0.75|formula=20% per 0.075 seconds. ''This is capped at 0.75 seconds.''}}.

''Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}. If {{ai|Ionian Fervor|Irelia}} would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the recast is initiated.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which she increases Defiant Dance's damage over the first 0.75 seconds of the channel and reduces incoming physical damage by 40% − 70% (based on level) (+ 7% per 100 AP) and incoming magic damage by 20% − 35% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP). Defiant Dance's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
Defiant Dance can be recast within its duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
Recast: Irelia swipes with her blades in the target direction, retaining Defiant Dance's damage reduction for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated and dealing physical damage to enemies around her and within a line, increased by 0 to 0.75 ‒ undefined.
Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control. If Irelia's Ionian Fervor would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every 0.25 seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*3 to 70*3}} {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Enemies around '''Irelia''' will be dealt the damage once the recast's cast time ends, while enemies within the line are dealt the damage via a missile that reaches the furthest targets after a {{rutngt|0.05}} delay after the recast's cast time.
* Quick Casting utilizes hold-and-release for the two casts.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% physical damage reduction at {{as|{{pp|{{#expr:(1-0.4)/0.0007 round 2}} to {{#expr:(1-0.7)/0.0007 round 2}}}} AP}}.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% magic damage reduction at {{as|{{pp|{{#expr:(1-0.2)/0.00035 round 2}} to {{#expr:(1-0.35)/0.00035 round 2}}}} AP}}.
* ''Defiant Dance'' will also recast automatically upon entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** This refers to the recast.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Irelia''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|cast=false|items=false|move=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets|spells=true,false,false,false,recasts|interrupts=death}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Damage: (+ 40% AD) (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 120% AD) (+ 120% AP)

e1.name: Flawless_Duet
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' sends a blade to the target location for {{fd|3.5}} seconds. ''Flawless Duet'' can be recast after {{fd|0.15}} seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is channeling {{si|Teleport}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if ''Flawless Duet'' was recast automatically.

Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over {{fd|0.25}} seconds, afterwards dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within a line between them and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|standard sight|revealed}}.
''Flawless Duet's recast can be used during {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}} and the cast time of {{ai|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}}. Each of the blades' travel times are {{rutngt|0.25}}.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia sends a blade to the target location for 3.5 seconds. Flawless Duet can be recast after 0.15 seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is channeling Teleport.
Recast: Irelia sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if Flawless Duet was recast automatically.
Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over 0.25 seconds, afterwards dealing magic damage to all enemies within a line between them and stunning them for 0.75 seconds, during which they are revealed.
Flawless Duet's recast can be used during Irelia's Bladesurge and the cast time of Irelia's Vanguard's Edge. Each of the blades' travel times are 0.264.
e1.notes:
* Both casts count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger and it will be considered as an ability activation. This is the only ability with this interaction in the game.
* ''Flawless Duet'' will recast automatically at its end during {{ai|Defiant Dance|Irelia}} despite being disabled.
* ''Flawless Duet'' will also recast automatically upon entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The blades will not stun nor deal damage if they fail to converge (i.e {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}).
* '''Irelia''' can recast ''Flawless Duet'' during {{sis|Hexflash}} channel without interrupting it.
* Both of ''Flawless Duet's'' casts will be buffered and cast when their cooldowns end if the player attempts to cast each within {{fd|0.3}} seconds of their cooldown ending.

r1.name: Vanguard's_Edge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and briefly {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them.

After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''The perimeter will point at the same angle '''Irelia''' casted it from, but based on the target's center.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Irelia's Bladesurge cooldown is reduced.
Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly revealing them.
After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them airborne, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for 2.5 seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt magic damage and are slowed by 90% for 1.5 seconds.
The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
